onActionAddCusCountryCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerFormController
This method updates the state combo box with a list from the country that is selected from the country combo box.
onActionAllRadio(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsFormController
This method refreshes aRTable view with all appointments and sets label.
onActionAppAddButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsFormController
This method triggers when the add button is pressed and switches to the add appointment form.
onActionAppCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method clears the text fields and goes back to the appointments form.
onActionAppDeleteButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsFormController
This method triggers when the delete button is pressed, checks if there is a selection, and triggers proper popup forms.
onActionAppointmentsFormBackButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsFormController
This method triggers when the back button is pressed and switches to the main menu form.
onActionAppSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method checks for errors and adds or updates an appointment.
onActionAppUpdateButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsFormController
This method triggers when the update button is pressed and switches to the add apointment form only if something is selected.
onActionBackButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsFormController
This method moves the month or week level back one.

This method switches screen to the mainmenu form.

This method triggers when the back button is pressed.
onActionBackButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerReportFormController
This method is triggered when the back button is pressed and switches the screen to the main menu.

This method triggers when the delete button is pressed, checks if there is a selection, and then deletes the selected customer.

This method triggers when the save button is pressed and then checks the form for mistakes and then adds or updates a customer.

This method switches the screen to the customer report screen.
onActionCusUpdateButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersFormController
This method triggers when the update button is pressed, checks for a selection, and switches to the add customer form.
onActionDatePicker(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method checks if datepicker is not selected and if a past day is selected.
onActionEndHourComboBox(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method checks to see if the last hour is selected on the start hour combo box and then loads the end minute combo box with only the value of "00" if it is.
onActionExitButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LogInFormController
This method exits the application.
onActionForwardButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsFormController
This method moves the month or week level forward one.
onActionLoginButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LogInFormController
This method triggers when the login button is pressed, checks for empty text fields, checks user and password log in, saves user attempt, switches screen to main menu form if successful, popup notifing if appointment is within 15 minutes.

This method switches the screen to the appointments screen.

This method exits the application.

This method triggers when the cancel button is pressed and switches or closes the screen.

This method triggers when the ok button is pressed, checks if it is a customer,appointment,just close or switch screen situation and deals with it accordingly.
onActionWeeklyRadio(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsFormController
This method refreshes aRTable view with all weekly appointments and sets label.
